name: JD.com, Inc.
description: JD.com, Inc. is one of China's largest e-commerce companies and a leader in online retail. Founded in 1998 by Liu Qiangdong, JD.com has transformed the way consumers shop by offering a vast selection of products ranging from electronics to groceries. The company operates a direct sales model, ensuring high-quality products and fast delivery through its extensive logistics network, which spans across China. JD.com is known for its commitment to customer satisfaction and has incorporated advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence and big data analytics to enhance the shopping experience. The platform also supports third-party sellers, allowing them to reach a broader audience while maintaining JD's rigorous standards for quality and service. In addition to its core e-commerce business, JD.com has made significant investments in technology and logistics infrastructure, including automated warehouses and drone delivery services, setting the stage for future growth in the competitive retail landscape. As a publicly traded company on the NASDAQ, JD.com continues to expand its footprint both domestically and internationally, offering a diverse range of products and services while striving to innovate in the fast-evolving world of online shopping.

seo.meta_title: JD.com, Inc. | Leading E-Commerce Platform in China
seo.meta_description: Explore JD.com, Inc., a leading e-commerce platform in China. Discover a wide range of products, fast delivery services, and innovative shopping experiences.

faq.question: What is JD.com known for?
faq.answer: JD.com is known for its extensive e-commerce platform offering a wide range of products and fast delivery services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of JD.com?
faq.answer: Liu Qiangdong is the CEO of JD.com, Inc.

faq.question: Where is JD.com headquartered?
faq.answer: JD.com is headquartered in Beijing, China.

faq.question: What are JD.com's main product categories?
faq.answer: JD.com's main product categories include electronics and groceries.
